name: name
description: The name of the avatar item. This will not be displayed on the screen however.

name: accessibleLabel
description: The accessible label for the avatar item. Only needed in case the item is used alone. If not specified, the item will get `aria-hidden="true"`.

name: background
description: The background color of the avatar item.

name: icon
description: The icon to be displayed in the avatar item. Please refer to the `OcIcon` component to see how to use icon names.

name: iconFillType
description: The fill type of the icon.

name: width
description: The width of the avatar item.
